scripts.build:wasm: mkdir -p public && gmake -BC paka -f emcc.mak EFLAGS='--bind -s INVOKE_RUN=0 -g3 -s EXPORTED_FUNCTIONS="[_vm_main_default, _vm_main_add_arg]" -s EXPORTED_RUNTIME_METHODS="[ccall]" -s ALLOW_MEMORY_GROWTH=1 -s WASM=1 -s SINGLE_FILE=1 -s EXPORT_ES6=0 -s MODULARIZE=1 -DVM_EMCC -lidbfs.js -s FORCE_FILESYSTEM=1 -s EXTRA_EXPORTED_RUNTIME_METHODS="['FS']" --embed-file ../bins/boot.bc@boot.bc --embed-file ../lang/io.paka@io.paka'
scripts.build: npm run build:wasm && npm run build:js
